mapper.select: SELECT id, name, category, description, created_at AS createdAt, updated_at AS updatedAt FROM items ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT id, name, category, description, created_at AS createdAt, updated_at AS updatedAt FROM items WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO items (name, category, description, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{name}, #{category}, #{description}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE items SET name = #{name}, category = #{category}, description = #{description}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
